name: XZBox
tagline: We work in our dark rooms for a lighter web
body:
We build great websites and web based applications.
# Our goals
Our main goal is change web to a better place and we work hard for this big goal

# Projects
## [PHPSocket](https://github.com/xzbox/PHPSocket)
It's a php framework for creating realtime web applications in PHP

## [HIPO](https://xzbox.github.io/HIPO/)
HIPO is the first open source platform for programming contest in the world and we hope to make it a better and better per day.
Also HIPO is one of our main goals
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
